## LaTeX Conversion

This export converts LaTeX delimiters for KaTeX compatibility:
- `\( ` → `$` (space removed)
- ` \)` → `$` (space removed)
- `\[` → `$$`
- `\]` → `$$`

**Standard Joplin KaTeX rendering handles all math expressions!**
